name: Captain, The Rudder's Shot!
description:
The last thing commander Stevenson of the HMS indefatigable needed to hear in the pirate infested waters of Searea was that his pilot couldn't steer. Now he needs to use his ship's firepower to reach the shore!

Fire broadsides: 1, 2, 3 or left, right, space

Speed up: up, W or down, S

Tip:

-Dodge incoming shots by speeding up or slowing down.

-If you try to steam away at full speed the enemy will overwhelm you, so deal with each enemy as it appears before more arrive.
